name: Forest Legends: The Call of Love Collector's Edition
description: The Call of Love echoes through an enchanted forest. Will you answer?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB 3D graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
